actions.message:
Here's a list of some helpful commands! 

**.bot** - Information about the bot.

**.info** - Gives information about what CSGO is.

**.pistols** - Gives you a list of all the pistols in CSGO.

**.smgs** - Gives you a list of all the SMGS in CSGO.

**.rifles** - Gives you a list of all the rifles in CSGO.

**.heavy** - Gives you a list of all the heavy's in CSGO.

**.grenades** - Gives you a list of all the grenades in CSGO.

**.gear** - Gives you a list of all the gears in CSGO.

**.price** - Gives you a list of all the prices in Counter Strike.

**.prefix** - Sends you the prefix of the bot 

**.report [user] [reason]** - Reports a specific user for staff to view. 
*Please include proof when you report somebody, otherwise your report will automaticlly be denied.*

**.suggest [suggestion]** - Makes a suggestion for the server. 

**.roll** - Gives you a random number between 1 and 100.

More commands coming soon!

actions.title: Cookie Perk | We all love cookies
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
üç™ __Cookie Perk & Info__
The cookie perk is a perk that everybody has access to use. It's a useless perk that just makes users have fun. Members are able to redeem a cookie everyday by typing `.dailycookie`. If you would like to check how many cookies you have, you can type `.cookiejar` and it will tell you have many cookies you have. This command is still in testing so you should expect some bugs, hopefully not. If you witness a bug, please contact Humble#01111. Enjoy the command!

__Cookie Commands__
`.cookieshop` Shows the shop and stuff that you can buy with cookies.
`.cookieperk` Shows the help option which is what you're looking at right now
`.cookiejar` Shows how many cookies you have.
`.dailycookie` Receive your cookie everyday.

__Admin Commands__
`.setcookies [number]` Sets the number of cookies you want in your jar.
`.resetcookies [member` Resets a members cookies.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: You have now been unbanned from the CSGO Bot Server.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Here's a list of Admin/Staff Commands!

`.ahelp` - Gives you a list of admin/staff commands (Staff+ only) 

`.clear [amount]` - Clears a certain amount of messages.
(eg; .clear 12) 

`.ban [@user] [reason]` - Bans a member for a specific reason.
*A message will be sent to the users DM's notifiying them about their ban.*

`.kick [@user] [reason]` - Kicks a member for a specific reason. 
*A message will be sent to the users DM's notifiying them about their kick.*

`.mute [@user] [reason]` - Mutes the user for a specific reason given. 
*Please make sure that all mutes have evidence within the reason.*

`.warn [@user] [reason]` - Warns a member for a specific reason. 
*A message will be sent to the users DM's notifiying them about their warn.*

`.acceptreport [@user] [@userReported]` - Accepts a report a user has submitted to staff against another user.
(eg; .acceptreport @Humble 12/17/18)
*This is basically accepting the report Humble made against JiggleJigglePop*

`.denyreport [@user] [@userreported]` - Rejects a report a user has submitted to staff against another user.
(eg; .denyreport @Humble 12/17/18 No proof)
*This is basically denying the report Humble made againt JiggleJigglePop*

`.announce [channel] [message]` - Makes an announcement to the specific typed channel.
NOTE: *If you do not type it the correct way, your announcement will be messed up.*
Example for announcement: .announce #announcement Hello everyone! We will be creating a new minecraft server! Woohoo!

Extra Information: For the command `.report`, you are going to have to setup a channel exactly called reports and make the bot have access to talk in that channel. Therefor, you can receive report notifications.
